description:
Round 3 of the regular meet at Asagaoka reaches its climax! Two have already emerged as winners, leaving room for only one more to advance to the next round! Shiki, Mikuriya, and Akira all use their unique abilities to the fullest as the intense back-and-forth battle continues. The contest for a seat in the semifinal round, with each player`s pride on the line, comes down to the final question... Who will emerge victorious?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A. Parce que le quiz est là !
A. Soko ni Quiz ga Aru kara!
A. そこにクイズがあるから!
A: Because the Question Is There!
